_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The comparison of the number of sentient: Sentient beings born on land are few
Sentient beings born in water are many
Sentient beings reborn as humans are few
Sentient beings not reborn as humans are many
Sentient beings reborn in civilized countries are few
Sentient beings reborn in the borderlands, among strange barbarian tribes, are many
Sentient beings who are wise, bright, clever, and able to distinguish what is well said from what is poorly said are few
Sentient beings who are witless, dull, stupid, and unable to distinguish what is well said from what is poorly said are many
Sentient beings who have the noble eye of wisdom are few
Sentient beings who are ignorant and confused are many
Sentient beings who get to see a Realized One are few
Sentient beings who don't get to see a Realized One are many
Sentient beings who get to hear the teaching and training proclaimed by a Realized One are few
Sentient beings who don't get to hear the teaching and training proclaimed by a Realized One are many
Sentient beings who remember the teachings they hear are few
Sentient beings who don't remember the teachings are many
Sentient beings who examine the meaning of the teachings they have memorized are few
Sentient beings who don't examine the meaning of the teachings are many
Sentient beings who understand the meaning and the teaching and practice accordingly are few
Sentient beings who understand the meaning and the teaching but don't practice accordingly are many
Sentient beings inspired by inspiring places are few
Sentient beings who are uninspired are many
Sentient beings who, being inspired, strive effectively are few
Sentient beings who, even though inspired, don't strive effectively are many
Sentient beings who, relying on letting go, gain immersion, gain unification of mind are few
Sentient beings who don't gain immersion, don't gain unification of mind relying on letting go are many
Sentient beings who get the best food and flavors are few
Sentient beings who don't get the best food and flavors, but get by with scraps in an alms bowl are many
Sentient beings who get the essence of the meaning, the essence of the teaching, and the essence of freedom are few
Sentient beings who don't get the essence of the meaning, the essence of the teaching, and the essence of freedom are many
Sentient beings who die as humans and are reborn as humans are few
Sentient beings who die as humans and are reborn in hell, or the animal realm, or the ghost realm are many
Sentient beings who die as gods and are reborn as gods are few
Sentient beings who die as gods and are reborn in hell, or the animal realm, or the ghost realm are many
Sentient beings who die in hell and are reborn as humans are few
Sentient beings who die in hell and are reborn in hell, or the animal realm, or the ghost realm are many
Sentient beings who die as animals and are reborn as humans are few
Sentient beings who die as animals and are reborn in hell, or the animal realm, or the ghost realm are many
Sentient beings who die as ghosts and are reborn as humans are few
Sentient beings who die as ghosts and are reborn in hell, or the animal realm, or the ghost realm are many
